definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Jenny didn’t say anything but lifted her little hand up to her daddy.
sentences.chinese: 詹妮没有答话，只把小手举到爸爸面前。

sentences.english: The old inhabitant who answered was a tall, gaunt woman.
sentences.chinese: 这个答话的本地老住户是一个高个儿，瘦身材的女人。

sentences.english: He did not Dahua, continue to speak the story.
sentences.chinese: 他没有答话，继续说着故事。

sentences.english: Idea ground the calm and steady face answer.
He plays with that whistle, again very town quiet the ground answer.
sentences.chinese: 他玩弄着那警笛，又很镇静地答话。
她用响亮而深沉的声音答话。

sentences.english: But the housemaid of that flank mama Zhou administer on behalf of Yi to answer again.
sentences.chinese: 但那旁边的女仆周妈又代管伊答话。

sentences.english: Molly did not answer. She went out of the room and closed the door.
sentences.chinese: 莫利没答话，她走出房间关上了门。

sentences.english: She was too nervous to reply , but fortunately she did not need to say nothing .
sentences.chinese: 她紧张的无法答话，但是幸运的是她什么也不需要说。

sentences.english: His last hope was destroyed by the manner of her reply.
sentences.chinese: 她答话的态度摧毁了他最后一线希望。

sentences.english: The students started to write in their exercise books, and for a short time nobody spoke.
sentences.chinese: 学生们开始写在练习本，很短的一段时间没有人答话。

sentences.english: Purple Mo doesn't response, she rely in the soft preside.
sentences.chinese: 紫莫并未答话，她靠在软椅中。

sentences.english: I opened my mouth to reply, and I perceived that there was no one near me.
sentences.chinese: 我张开嘴，正要答话，但是我看见四周绝没有一个人。
我们能分辨出一些问话和一些答话。

sentences.english: But Quentin simply whimpered and did not answer.
sentences.chinese: 但是昆廷只是在哼哼，没有答话。

definition: to have heard what was said
to utter a word/to make a sound/to cheep/to squeak/also pr. [zi1 sheng1]
to have a smile on one's face
